author: Reuters
title: Statistics Canada for first time ever releases GDP data early — and it’s the worst on record
description: 'Economic disruptions have been both deep and widespread in the month of March'
content:
OTTAWA — Canada’s economy shrank a record 9 per cent in March from February as the coronavirus outbreak forced the shutdown of economic activity during the course of the month, Statistics Canada said in a flash estimate on Wednesday.
